channel.title: Reaper on Balance Guides

item.title: Reaper Advanced Guide
item.description: Reaper Advanced Rotational Theory Author: Ellunavi Sevald Contributors: Dook Prime, Torael Valdis, Rin Karigani, Laille Ormesaing Disclaimers This guide is written in the time period between the Media Tour and the live release of Endwalker. After launch, we will update this document as required and remove this part of the disclaimer. We are expecting things to change and some theories discussed here to not be feasible in game. If you are cracking into this document and it’s your first time reading about Reaper, I highly recommend you read Dook’s guide, found here.
